Text: My Speed Post (IN882910) was supposed to reach Mumbai yesterday but tracking still shows New Delhi. This is urgent legal paperwork!
The postman in the Indiranagar branch was extremely rude. He refused to deliver the parcel to my door and asked me to come to the street.
I received my package today but the box was completely crushed. The electronic item inside is broken. How do I claim insurance?
What are the current interest rates for the Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana account? I want to open one for my daughter.
Tracking status says 'Delivered' but I have not received anything yet. Please check who signed for it. Tracking ID: SP123456.
I have been trying to call the customer care number for 3 hours but no one is picking up. Very poor service.
My passport dispatch is delayed. It has been stuck at the sorting center for 5 days. I have a flight next week!
The tracking website is down. I get a 404 error whenever I try to enter my consignment number.
The postman threw the packet over the gate and my dog tore it up. Why didn't he ring the bell?
I want to change the delivery address for my parcel IN998877. It is currently in transit. Is this possible?
Excellent service by the localized post office staff. Just wanted to send a thank you note.
My money order of Rs. 5000 has not reached my village yet. It has been 10 days.
I sent a Rakhi to my brother in Pune but it reached after Raksha Bandhan. Very disappointed with the delay.
Is there a way to calculate postage for international shipping to Canada online?
The staff at the counter made me wait for 45 minutes just to buy stamps. They were busy talking to each other.
My parcel was opened and resealed with tape. Items are missing from inside. This is theft!
Tracking ID IN112233. Status has not updated in 48 hours. Please update.
I need to send a bulk consignment of 500 letters for my business. Do you offer corporate discounts?
The PIN code on my receipt is wrong. The operator typed 500081 instead of 500084. Will it still be delivered?
Please stop sending SMS updates in the middle of the night. It is very disturbing.
The parcel tracking shows 'Out for Delivery' since 3 days. Where is my package?
Staff at the counter refused to accept my registered post saying the server is down. This happens every week.
Received a damaged envelope. The important documents inside are wet and torn. Who is responsible?
I want to open a Public Provident Fund (PPF) account. What documents do I need to carry?
My grandmother's pension money order is delayed by 2 weeks. She needs the money for medicine.
Can I send a parcel to Australia via Speed Post? What are the restrictions?
The postman asked for a 'tip' to deliver my passport. This is bribery and unacceptable.
My package is stuck at the customs office for 10 days. Tracking ID CP998877IN.
The tracking link you sent via SMS is broken. It leads to a blank page.
I sent a gift to my sister but she received an empty box. Someone stole the contents in transit.
Why is there no card payment option at the post office? Cash only is very inconvenient.
The post office in my area is always closed during lunch hours from 1 PM to 3 PM. Is this official timing?
I need to track a consignment sent from Kolkata to Delhi. The receipt is lost. Can I track by name?
My parcel was delivered to the wrong address! My neighbor gave it to me later. Very careless.
I want to invest in the Kisan Vikas Patra scheme. What is the maturity period?
The behavior of the staff at the enquiry counter was very rude. They shouted at an elderly person.
My parcel has been marked as 'Undelivered - Addressee Left' but I have lived here for 10 years!
Is tracking available for ordinary post? I sent a letter 2 weeks ago and it hasn't reached.
The packaging was torn and the contents were spilling out when I received the delivery.
How do I register a complaint about a lost money order? The helpline is not working.
I was overcharged for the postage. The weight was 50g but they charged for 100g slab.
Can I schedule a pickup for a bulk parcel from my office?
The postman forged my signature and left the parcel on the porch.
I applied for a Philately account 2 months ago but haven't received my ID card yet.
What is the procedure to transfer my savings account from one post office to another?
My speed post to Chennai is delayed. It contains urgent medicines. Please help.
Tracking shows delivered but I was at home all day and no one came.
The staff refused to give me a receipt for the registered post. Is this standard procedure?
I want to close my Recurring Deposit account prematurely. What is the penalty?
The digital weighing scale at the counter seems faulty. It shows different weights every time.
My parcel arrived 15 days late. I missed my friend's birthday because of this delay.
The postman frequently delivers letters to the wrong house in our colony.
I need information on the Monthly Income Scheme (MIS). Can I open a joint account?
The glass item I sent was wrapped in bubble wrap but still arrived broken. mishandling at sorting center.
Can I change the nominee for my PPF account online?
The queue management system is broken. People are cutting lines and staff is ignoring it.
My international parcel is stuck at the Foreign Post Office in Delhi for 3 weeks.
I was not informed that my parcel had arrived. It was returned to sender after 7 days.
Postman demanded 50 rupees for Diwali baksheesh. Unprofessional.
I want to apply for the Senior Citizen Savings Scheme. What is the age limit?
Tracking ID IN555666 is invalid. Please check.
The package was wet and smelled of rain water. Please protect mail from weather.
Service is very slow. It took 20 minutes to process one speed post.
My ATM card applied through Post Office Savings Bank has not arrived yet.
I want to send a parcel to a soldier in the Army. Is there a special APO address rate?
The postman keeps throwing letters in the garden instead of the mailbox.
I have not received the interest for my TD account for the last quarter.
My parcel was routed to the wrong state! It went to Kerala instead of Karnataka.
The staff was very helpful in filling out the form for me. Appreciate the help.
Complaint regarding lost registered letter RL223344. It contained original marksheets.
What are the working hours for the GPO on Saturdays?
The tracking system is very laggy. It updates 2 days after the actual event.
My wife's passport was delivered to a security guard without ID verification. Unsafe.
I want to buy My Stamp sheets for a corporate event. Who do I contact?
The parcel I received had been tampered with. The seal was broken.
Pension payment is always late at this branch. Please look into it.
Postman refused to come to the 3rd floor. We have an elevator!
Delay in delivery of interview letter. I missed my interview date!
I need to update my mobile number linked to my savings account.
The parcel was smashed. It looks like someone stepped on it.
Staff behavior was very rude when I asked for a pen.
Is there a tracking facility for postcards?
My speed post has not been delivered even after 7 days. It was supposed to take 2 days.
I want to complain about the cleanliness of the post office. It is very dirty.
The server is always down at 10 AM. Why open if you can't work?
I sent money to my son but the amount credited is less than what I sent.
Can I pay my electricity bill at the post office?
The postman is very polite and always on time. Good job.
My parcel is showing delivered but I am in a different city! Fake delivery update.
I want to know the claim process for lost articles.
The speed post charges are too high compared to private couriers.
I received someone else's Aadhaar card in my mail. This is a privacy breach.
The tracking says 'Door Locked' but I was home all day! The postman didn't come.
How to activate net banking for my post office savings account?
The parcel was left in the rain by the gate. Everything is soaked.
Staff refused to help me fill the money order form.
My sports kit sent via parcel post is missing. Tracking stopped at the hub.
I want to complain about the lack of seating arrangement for senior citizens.
The postman asks for money every time he delivers a passport.
Delivery was delayed by a week. No explanation given.
